summary: This module contains unit tests that verify the hyperparameter optimization (HPO) workflow of the MONAI Auto3Dseg framework, including setup of test fixtures, retrieval of previous optimization history, execution of bundle generation algorithms, and integration with the Optuna library.
business_intent: Validate and ensure the correctness of the automated hyperparameter tuning process for 3D medical image segmentation models, supporting reliable model configuration and performance improvement in clinical AI applications.
